column5: Welcome to a beautiful and spacious non-smoking family home in a quiet neighborhood. The house is very new with all the amenities that any guest would need. It has free wifi, ample parking, washer/dryer, AC, heating, 65 inch Smart TV in the living room with Netflix, YouTube, Hulu and other apps and a big kitchen to cook for multiple people. We also have a dining room that seats 6(not pictured) and a small breakfast table that seats 2 near the kitchen.
column8: Beautiful home in the NW Houston (Tomball) suburbs
